title: Charlie Ventura - The Complete Pasadena Concert 1949
description:
CHARLIE VENTURA and His "Bop For The People" Septet

THE COMPLETE PASADENA CONCERT 1949

01. Introduction
02. Yesterdays
03. Introduction of Musicians - The Peanut Vendor
04. Euphoria
05. Fine And Dandy
06. East Of Suez
07. If I Had You
08. I'm Forever Blowing Bubbles
09. Pennies From Heaven
10. How High The Moon
11. Flamingo
12. Birdland
13. Body And Soul
14. Lullaby In Rhythm
15. Boptura
16. Over The Rainbow
17. Dark Eyes
18. High On An Open Mike


Charlie Ventura - tenor & baritone sax
Conte Candoli - trumpet
Benny Green - trombone
Boots Mussulli - alto & baritone sax
Roy Kral - piano & vocals
Jackie Cain - vocals
Kenny O'Brien - bass
Ed Shaughnessy - drums

Recorded at the Pasadena Civic Auditorium, May 9, 1949

2002 Fresh Sound Records

This release adds a whole bunch of tracks not on the original LP or CD
